name: Fleshspurned
description: A spectral undead creature with an eerie presence, possessing oversized teeth and the ability to fly without walking.
memorable: It thrives on causing confusion and can turn its enemies ghostly, making them susceptible to its attacks.
goals: To disrupt opponents and weaken them by causing chaos and confusion in combat.
relations: Can be encountered alongside other undead creatures.
environment: Typically found in dark or haunted areas, often where the undead gather.
strengths: Advantage on attacks against incorporeal undead; significant necrotic damage output.
weaknesses: Very low Strength makes it weak in direct melee confrontations.
attacks: Phantasmal Bite deals necrotic damage and can cause targets to become ghostly, while Chatter confuses enemies within range.
most_powerful_ability: Ghost Eater, which allows it to gain temporary hit points by defeating other undead.
senses: Has a passive perception of 14, reflecting its awareness of threats.
skills: Proficient in stealth and perception, enhancing its capabilities as a stealthy foe.
additional_information: Immune to necrotic and poison damage.
Can move through objects as if difficult terrain, risking force damage.
Resilient against many conditions, making it hard to disable.
Attacks lead to confusion or ghostly effects on targets.
Uses confusion tactics to disrupt enemy strategies.
test_queries: stealthy undead that deals necrotic damage
creature that sustains itself through chaos
monster with oversized teeth that causes confusion
